info.author: huwwp
info.description:
cryptocli
=========

Command line interface for querying current value of cryptocurrenies in
a given fiat.

.. image:: screen.png

Installation
------------

The easiest way to install cryptocli is through pip

.. code:: bash

    sudo pip install cryptocli


Otherwise it can be installed manually, download the repo and run 

.. code:: bash

    sudo python setup.py install

Both pip and setup.py can be run with a --user flag if you would prefer
not to sudo.

Usage
-----

Simple query

.. code:: bash

    cryptocli BTC
    2332.1

Accepts a comma seperated list of coins

.. code:: bash

    cryptocli BTC,ETH,XMR
    2404.39
    218.53
    40

Query with conversion to a given currency.

.. code:: bash

    cryptocli BTC,ETH,XMR -c JPY
    269731.76
    24712.42
    4563.86

Query with conversion and outputting a formatted string

.. code:: bash

    cryptocli BTC,ETH,XMR -c JPY -f
    BTCJPY:269679.75
    ETHJPY:24718.85
    XMRJPY:4562.29

Credits
-------

Uses the cryptocompare.com API
